attributes.action: put himself up for arrest for  undermining democracy and treason
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How can ANY person in this country sign an international treaty that places us all under the control of a foreign power with out the explicit ascent of the British people? 
The latest treaty IS the constitution under a new name so the promise applies, the fact its not carried out means at the best an untrue promise was made.
The lack of a vote on this means democracy again takes a backseat to politicians ego's - what is the point of me taking an interest if I get no say - and am lied to at election time?
Putting this country and its Queen under the power of a foreign body must also amount to treason.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
